title: Covid Watch Arizona
description: Let your smartphone notify you to potential exposure to COVID-19–using fully anonymous Bluetooth signals–and help stop the spread of coronavirus in Arizona. Get peace of mind by taking this small step and start rebuilding trust in your community – install this free app, released in partnership with the Arizona Department of Health Services (ADHS). Once you opt-in and enable exposure notification on your phone, Covid Watch works in the background, automatically detecting if you come into close proximity with someone else, without tracking you by GPS or ever revealing any personal data. The more people participate, the more effective we can be. Encourage your friends, family, and colleagues to install Covid Watch today. Members of the following campus communities can access a customized version of the app: • University of Arizona • Northern Arizona University Provided by Covid Watch, an Arizona non-profit organization dedicated to your health and privacy.
